thread.title: Pulse gunman widow found not guilty

title: Pulse gunman widow found not guilty
text:
Pulse gunman widow found not guilty 11:09pm IST - 01:34 
Noor Salman, the widow of Pulse nightclub gunman Omar Mateen, was acquitted on Friday of federal charges that she tried to obstruct investigators and aided her husband in the attack that killed 49 people in 2016. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
